productInfo.name: Findabl
productInfo.tagline: Free SEO & GEO Analyzer | Optimize for Google + AI Search
productInfo.creator: 3Cubed.ai

description.short: Get your free SEO and GEO score. Discover how your website ranks on Google AND AI platforms like ChatGPT, Perplexity & Claude.
description.long: Findabl is a free tool to analyze your website's SEO score and GEO score (AI-readiness for ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Claude). It provides actionable recommendations in 30 seconds.
description.valueProposition: Measure visibility in both traditional search (Google) and AI search platforms (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Google AI Overviews)

keyFeatures.name: SEO Score
keyFeatures.description: Traditional search engine optimization analysis for Google rankings and backlinks

keyFeatures.name: GEO Score
keyFeatures.description: Generative Engine Optimization score measuring how likely AI systems will cite and recommend your website

keyFeatures.name: AI Search Visibility
keyFeatures.description: Analyze readiness for ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and Google AI Overviews

keyFeatures.name: E-E-A-T Analysis
keyFeatures.description: Evaluate Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

keyFeatures.name: Automated Monitoring (Pro)
keyFeatures.description: Weekly and monthly monitoring with email reports tracking score changes

productBenefits: Discover how your website ranks on Google AND AI platforms
Get cited by AI assistants like ChatGPT and Perplexity
Optimize for Google AI Overviews (formerly SGE)
Track AI-specific factors like content citability
Measure signals that traditional SEO tools don't analyze
Free to use for basic analysis

differentiators: Specifically designed for the AI search era
Unique GEO score for AI platform visibility
Analyzes AI-specific factors like content citability
Measures E-E-A-T signals that traditional tools miss
competitivePositioning.gap: Traditional SEO tools focus on Google rankings and backlinks but don't measure visibility in AI platforms

primary: Marketing leaders responsible for brand visibility
SEO professionals adapting to AI search
painPoints: Don't know if their content appears in AI search results
Unsure how to optimize for ChatGPT and Perplexity
Need to track AI Overviews readiness
Want to get cited by AI assistants

keyTerminology.GEO: Generative Engine Optimization - optimization for AI-powered search platforms
keyTerminology.SEO: Search Engine Optimization - optimization for traditional search engines
keyTerminology.E-E-A-T: Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness - signals AI systems use to evaluate sources
keyTerminology.AI Overviews: Google's AI-generated answers at the top of search results (formerly SGE)
keyTerminology.Content Citability: How likely AI systems are to cite your content as a source

contentTopics: How to get cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude

messagingFramework.hook: AI search is rapidly becoming the front door to information. Are you visible there?
messagingFramework.problem: Traditional SEO tools don't measure AI search visibility. Your brand might be invisible to ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google AI Overviews.
messagingFramework.solution: Findabl provides both SEO and GEO scores, showing exactly how visible you are in both traditional search AND AI platforms.
messagingFramework.proof: Analyzes AI-specific factors like content citability, E-E-A-T signals, and conversational structure
messagingFramework.cta: Get your free SEO and GEO score in 30 seconds

exampleMessaging: Get your free SEO and GEO score. Discover how your website ranks on Google AND AI platforms.
AI search is rapidly becoming the front door to healthcare information. If your brand isn't visible there, you're missing the first point of contact.
Traditional SEO tools miss the signals that matter for AI search. Findabl measures what ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Claude actually look for.
From a systems lens, Findabl caught my attention. Most organizations still think website visibility is only about Google.

videoContent.title: Invisible to AI?
keyQuotes: For the past 20 years, we've all known the rules for getting found online. But well, everything's changing right now.
If your website isn't the source for that answer, you are for all intents and purposes invisible.
Your website has to become bilingual. It needs to keep speaking the old language of search engine crawlers, but now, it also has to become fluent in the brand new language of generative AI.
SEO was kind of like trying to game an old computer scanner. But GEO is like writing a killer resume for a sharp human hiring manager.
The single most important thing you have to get is that AI is our answer machines. That is their whole reason for being.
You can't just be an expert anymore. You have to structure your website to prove you're an expert in a way that a machine can easily read.
SEO is still the foundation of your house. What we're doing is building a second story on top of it.
The whole game is shifting. It's moving away from just being discoverable in a long list and toward becoming the definitive source for a single correct answer.
Is your content good enough, clear enough, and trustworthy enough for an AI to cite it as the truth?

keyMessages.theProblem: Users are asking AI a question and getting a direct answer. If your website isn't the source for that answer, you are invisible.
keyMessages.theShift: Welcome to the post-search era. Instead of scrolling through classic 10 blue links, users are asking an AI a question and getting a direct answer.
keyMessages.theSolution: Your website has to become bilingual - speaking both SEO (crawler language) and GEO (AI language).
keyMessages.theFramework: SEO is the foundation of your house. GEO is building a second story on top of it.

geo: Writing for a sharp human hiring manager

aiTrustSignals.description: AIs actively scan for what's, how's, why's - structured content that provides direct answers
Experience, Expertise, Authority, Trust - machine-readable proof of expertise

aiTrustSignals.benefit: Borrowing authority of sources makes your content more citable

fourStepBlueprint: Keep that SEO foundation strong. Don't neglect it.
Start weaving in all these GEO signals.
Actively structure your content to be a direct, citable answer.
Focus on building dual authority - trusted by both Google bots and AI models.
videoContent.closingMessage: In this post-search era, the only question that truly matters is: Is your content good enough, clear enough, and trustworthy enough for an AI to cite it as the truth?
